m_szDocSumamry: Directory:Keshe Foundation See also News:Keshe | News:Stories about Keshe Technology Used Militarily Plasma Energy and Anti-Gravity Applications "The Keshe Foundation is an independent non-profit and non-religious organization founded by nuclear engineer M.T. Keshe that aims to develop new scientific knowledge, new technologies and new solutions to major global problems like famine, water shortage, lack of electrical power supply, climate change, and disease, through the use of specially developed plasma reactors which will also give Mankind the real freedom to travel in deep Space." Nuclear e
